description:
Leon rescues Angelica and repairs his relationship with Olivia. He defeats the enemy`s Armors one after another to crush the duchy`s will to fight, but then the duchy`s strongest hero, Vandel the Black Knight, appears.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Egal wie bitter die Welt dieses Otome-Games auch ist
Même si cet univers de jeu de drague est dur
No Matter How Tough the World of Otome Games Is
Tatoe Doredake, Kono Otomege Sekai ga Kibishikute mo
Как бы ни был этот мир отомэ-игры жесток
たとえどれだけ, この乙女ゲー世界が厳しくても
